title: Backend developer, reliability engineer, and observability enthusiast.
description: As a dedicated and accomplished Cloud and Infrastructure Engineer, I have a proven track record of designing and implementing robust solutions that enhance system efficiency, reliability, and performance. My hands-on experience spans across many initiatives to streamline CI/CD pipelines, improve system health monitoring, and optimize deployment processes. I excel in languages such as Python, C#, C++, Java, and have expertise in AWS cloud services. My passion for technology and continuous learning drives me to develop innovative solutions focused on scalability.
